casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

February 18, 2011

[Cite as 02/1812011 Case Announcements, 2011-Ohio-732.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

In re Application of Grundstein.

On June 3, 2009, this court found Robert Grundstein to be a vexatious litigator under S.Ct.Prac.R. 14.5(B). This court further ordered that Grundstein was prohibited from continuing or instituting legal proceedings in this court without first obtaining leave. On February 10, 2011, Grundstein submitted a motion for leave to file a complaint for writ of mandamus and prohibition.

Upon consideration thereof, it is ordered by the court that the motion for leave of Robert Grundstein is denied.
